p: In conclusion, we have identified ongoing activity of invasive Aedes mosquitoes in Black Sea region of Anatolia. WNV circulation is documented for the first time in potential mosquito vectors in the region. No evidence of recently-emergent Zika, Chikungunya or other pathogenic flavi/alphavirus was observed. Insect-associated flavi and rhabdoviruses were detected, with near-complete genome of AEFV, reported initially from Anatolia.
